## IAssignmentHooks.onPostAssignment() method

Invoked after a subject is assigned. Useful for any post assignment logic needed which is specific to an experiment/flag. Do not use this for logging assignments - use IAssignmentLogger instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onPostAssignment(variation: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  variation | string | the assigned variation |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
